Name: assign_worker_to_team
Description: Binary decision to assign a specific worker to a specific team.

Name: select_feature_for_release
Description: Binary decision to include a specific feature in the next release plan.

Name: allocate_sprint_budget
Description: The amount of budget to allocate to a specific sprint.

Name: set_team_size
Description: The number of workers assigned to a given team.

Name: assign_story_points
Description: The number of story points to assign to a user story.

Name: set_feature_priority
Description: The priority level assigned to a feature (e.g.

Name: plan_sprint_duration
Description: The duration of a sprint in days.

Name: assign_task_effort
Description: The estimated effort (in person-hours) for a task.

Name: set_worker_availability
Description: The percentage of time a worker is available for project work.

Name: blocker_resolution_resource
Description: The amount of resource (0-100) allocated to resolving a specific blocker.

Name: select_stakeholder_for_review
Description: Binary decision to invite a specific stakeholder to a sprint review.

Name: assign_skill_to_worker
Description: Binary decision to certify that a worker possesses a specific skill.
